summary: Auriel's Sniper Bow with Scopes- designed to play without HUD-Crosshair
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightgrey][center][b]<-------<< AURIEL'S SNIPER BOW >>------->[/b]

[b]Auriel's Sniper Bow is a Bow Weapon with Scopes - Designed for immersive Sniper Gameplay without HUD-Crosshair[/b]


[url=http://i.imgur.com/P84eGYE.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/S6y450K.jpg[/img][/url]
KlICK on THE PICTURES to see them BIG!
[url=http://i.imgur.com/8E0QKqf.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/WpPxbdw.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://i.imgur.com/HjiYDt2.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/oVEXWtN.jpg[/img][/url]
[/center]

[b]<-------<< Video >>------->[/b]

Thanks to sidras01. Review starts at 4:56. First person view also at the beginning.
[youtube]qaHwKgH8ODM#t=0[/youtube]


[b]<-------<< [/color][color=gold]INSTALLL-UNISTALL[/color][color=Lightgrey] >>------->[/b]

Info: Auriel's Sniper Bow is a replacer for auriels bow from the dawnguard dlc. The .esp is not absolutely necessary to use this mod. It only increases the damage for 5 points (all my sniper bows are doing around 5 points more damage than vanilla) and adds the word "Sniper" to the name.
If you are using skyre you don't need the .esp since damage increasement won't apply.

NEXUS MOD MANAGER (Recommended):

[u]Install[/u]
1.)Download and install the "Auriels Sniper Bow" main file
2.)Play and have Fun!

[u]You are using SkyRe[/u]
1.)Download and install the "Auriels Sniper Bow" main file
2.)Open your Skyrim/Data Folder and delete the "SniperBowAuriel.esp" file
3.)Play and have Fun!
Info: If you don't delete the .esp file, the bow will be recognized as a shortbow after patching with reproccer.

======= ======= =======

Folder Structure looks like this:

data/meshes/dlc01/weapons/auriel/aurielsbow.nif
data/textures/weapons/sniper sight bows/auriel/....-here are the textures


[u]Manual UNINSTALL:[/u]
Just remove the Files.




[b]<-------<< [/color][color=gold]How To Get In Game[/color][color=Lightgrey] >>------->[/b]

It is received from Gelebor during the quest Touching the Sky.(like vanilla)

[u]Cheating (Console Comand):[/u]
open the console with ^
1.)type: [b]help auriel[/b] it will show up with it's id
2.)type: [b]player.additem xxxxxxxx 1[/b] (instead of x type the numbers of the id - the 1 at the end stands for the number of bows that you will get)



[b]<-------<< [/color][color=gold]RECOMMENDATIONS[/color][color=Lightgrey] >>------->[/b]

[u]MODS:[/u]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1009//?]Faster Arrows[/url] (Not compatible with SkyRe)
"FasterArrows50.esp" should be enough! Faster Arrows not only makes arrows faster it slightly reduces the gravity for arrows, to get a higher range.

+DISABLE the HUD completely (this is how i play) or instead use one or both of the suggested mods below.


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3222/?]Immersive Hud[/url]
To turn crosshair and/or sneak eye off (this mod offers many great options)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26387/?]Simple Crosshair[/url]
To move the sneak eye down on your screen between health and magica bar download "oblivion style sneak eye" (works great in combination with iHud)

<-------<< >>------->

[u]SKYRIM.INI TWEAKS[/u](make a backup at first!)

[Combat]
fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7

[Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=12288.0000
